timeline.message: JBTM-3397 Rename Transaction to LongRunningAction and extend BasicAction

timeline.bodyText: just guessing but this was written separately to not include delimiters ('/') in the path I guess so this won't work on windows.

replies.bodyText: That is a very good point. In fact the whole method is assuming the ObjectStore is on a file system (so the test would fail, for example, on JDBC and in-memory stores) . I will raise a separate issue to rewrite the test to use the ObjectStore API to get the log (and to also check we aren't doing something similar elsewhere).
replies.author: mmusgrov

replies.bodyText: I will make sure the JIRA says that we need the ability to run the tests on at least one other store type.
replies.author: mmusgrov
